corr_gamma = np.zeros(len(corr_k))
        for i in range(5):
            results = mcmc_without_external_field(N, q, T, n_tempering=0, n_measure=1000, RATE=4, n_step=2, mes_energy=False, corr_k=corr_k)
            corr_gamma += np.maximum(results["corr_gamma"], 0)
        corr_gamma /= 5
